name: Shirahoshi
text:
This Leader cannot attack.
Activate: Main Once Per Turn You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards and flip the top card of your Life cards face up: You may play up to 1 Character card with the (Sea King) type or up to 1 [Megalos] Character card with a cost equal to or less than the total number of DON!! cards on your board from your hand.
